verses.verse: Then the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>"What<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to us, not <S%H7121>calling<s%> us <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H4080>Midian<s%>?" And they <S%H7378>contended<s%> with him <S%H2394>vigorously.<s%>

But he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>"What<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> in comparison with you? Is not the <S%H5955>gleaning<s%> [of the grapes] of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H1210>vintage<s%> of <S%H44>Abiezer<s%>?

<S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%> into your <S%H3027>hands;<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> was I <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> in comparison with you?" <S%H227>Then<s%> their <S%H7307>anger<s%> <S%H4480>toward<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him <S%H7503>subsided<s%> when he <S%H1696>said<s%> that.

Then <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> and <S%H300>the<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were with him <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> [and] <S%H5674>crossed<s%> <S%H5674>over,<s%> <S%H5889>weary<s%> yet <S%H7291>pursuing.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3603>loaves<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are <S%H7272>following<s%> me, for they are <S%H5889>weary,<s%> and I am <S%H7291>pursuing<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>"

And the <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Are the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> <S%H6258>already<s%> in your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> that we should <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> to your <S%H6635>army<s%>?"

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "All <S%H3651>right,<s%> when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> then I will <S%H1758>thrash<s%> your <S%H1320>bodies<s%> with the <S%H6975>thorns<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and with <S%H1303>briers.<s%>"

And he <S%H5927>went<s%> up from <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H6439>Penuel,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H2088>similarly<s%> to them; and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H6439>Penuel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> had <S%H6030>answered.<s%>

So he <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H6439>Penuel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "When I <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H7965>safely,<s%> I will <S%H5422>tear<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4026>tower.<s%>"

Now <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> were in <S%H7174>Karkor,<s%> and their <S%H4264>armies<s%> with them, about 15000 men, <S%H3605>all<s%> who were <S%H3498>left<s%> of the <S%H3605>entire<s%> <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6924>east;<s%> for the <S%H5307>fallen<s%> were 120000 <S%H376>swordsmen<s%><S%H8025>.<s%> <S%H2719><s%>

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of those who <S%H7931>lived<s%> in <S%H168>tents<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> of <S%H5025>Nobah<s%> and <S%H3011>Jogbehah,<s%> and <S%H5221>attacked<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> when the <S%H4264>camp<s%> was <S%H983>unsuspecting.<s%>

When <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> he <S%H7291>pursued<s%> them and <S%H3920>captured<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> and <S%H2729>routed<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4264>army.<s%>
Then <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3060>Joash<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from the <S%H4421>battle<s%> by the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H2776>Heres.<s%>

And he <S%H3920>captured<s%> a <S%H5288>youth<s%> from <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> and <S%H7592>questioned<s%> him. Then [the youth] <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H3789>down<s%> for him the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> and its <S%H2205>elders,<s%> seventy-seven <S%H376>men.<s%>

And he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> concerning <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H2778>taunted<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'Are the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> <S%H6258>already<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that we should <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> to your <S%H376>men<s%> who are <S%H3287>weary<s%>?'"

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H6975>thorns<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H1303>briers,<s%> and he <S%H3045>disciplined<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> with them.
And he <S%H5422>tore<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H6439>Penuel<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> <S%H375>"What<s%> <S%H375>kind<s%> of <S%H376>men<s%> [were] they <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H2026>killed<s%> at <S%H8396>Tabor<s%>?" And they <S%H559>said,<s%> "They were <S%H3644>like<s%> you, each <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8389>resembling<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H4428>king.<s%>"

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "They [were] my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of my <S%H517>mother.<s%> [As] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H3863>if<s%> <S%H3863>only<s%> you had let them <S%H2421>live,<s%> I would not <S%H2026>kill<s%> you."

So he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3500>Jether<s%> his first-born, <S%H6965>"Rise,<s%> <S%H2026>kill<s%> them." But the <S%H5288>youth<s%> did not <S%H8025>draw<s%> his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> for he was <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he was <S%H5750>still<s%> a <S%H5288>youth.<s%>

Then <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>"Rise<s%> up <S%H859>yourself,<s%> and <S%H6293>fall<s%> on us; for as the <S%H376>man,<s%> so is his <S%H1369>strength.<s%>" So <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7720>crescent<s%> <S%H7720>ornaments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were on their camels' <S%H6677>necks.<s%>

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> <S%H4910>"Rule<s%> over us, <S%H1571>both<s%> you and your <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%>'s son, for you have <S%H3467>delivered<s%> us from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>"

But <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "I will not <S%H4910>rule<s%> over you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4910>rule<s%> over you; the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H4910>rule<s%> over you."

Yet <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "I would <S%H7596>request<s%> <S%H7592><s%> of you, that <S%H376>each<s%> of you <S%H5414>give<s%> me an <S%H5141>earring<s%> from his <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>" (For they had <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5141>earrings,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they were <S%H3459>Ishmaelites.<s%>)

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> "We will <S%H5414>surely<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> [them.]" So they <S%H6566>spread<s%> out a <S%H8071>garment,<s%> and <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> of them <S%H7993>threw<s%> an <S%H5141>earring<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> from his <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>

And the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of the <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5141>earrings<s%> that he <S%H7592>requested<s%> was 1700 [shekels] of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H905>besides<s%> <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H7720>crescent<s%> <S%H7720>ornaments<s%> and the <S%H5188>pendants<s%> and the <S%H713>purple<s%> <S%H899>robes<s%> <S%H7945>which<s%> [were] on the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and <S%H905>besides<s%> <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H6060>neck<s%> <S%H6060>bands<s%> that [were] on their camels' <S%H6677>necks.<s%>

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> it into an <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and <S%H3322>placed<s%> it in his <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H6084>Ophrah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with it <S%H8033>there,<s%> so that it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> and his <S%H1004>household.<s%>

So <S%H4080>Midian<s%> was <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they did not <S%H5375>lift<s%> up their <S%H7218>heads<s%> <S%H3254>anymore.<s%> And the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H8252>undisturbed<s%> for <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1439>Gideon.<s%>
Then <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3060>Joash<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>
Now <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> who were his <S%H3409>direct<s%> <S%H3318>descendants,<s%> for he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H802>wives.<s%>

And his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was in <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> him a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and he <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7760><s%> him <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3060>Joash<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> at a <S%H2896>ripe<s%> <S%H7872>old<s%> <S%H7872>age<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H6913>tomb<s%> of his father <S%H1>Joash,<s%> in <S%H3060>Ophrah<s%> of the <S%H6084>Abiezrites.<s%>

Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, as <S%H9201>soon<s%> as <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> that the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with the <S%H1168>Baals,<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> Baal-berith their <S%H430>god.<s%>

Thus the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did not <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> who had <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them from the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H340>enemies<s%> on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side;<s%>

<S%H3808>nor<s%> did they <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to the <S%H1004>household<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> ([that is,] <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>), in accord with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9186>good<s%> that he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
